reviewText: I loved it. I have been to Medjugorje twice, and this film is a must see.
A very professional production.  Informative.  Deserves wide circulation.

I gave this video 5 stars because I fund it very inspirational. You get a lot of pilgrims on this DVD talking about their own experiences at Medjugorje. Plus you get a quick review about what happened there with the apparition. Whether you choose to believe in this apparition is completely up to you.  The video shows how individuals are experiencing peace and a relationship back to God and His Mother. I don't focus on the 10 secrets but the fruits which this place has shown which is peace and a coming back to God through His Mother!
